This is an introduction for IOHprofiler

About | IOHexperimenter | IOHanalyzer | News | Benchmark

IOHprofiler: A Benchmarking and Profiling Tool for Iterative Optimization Heuristics

IOHprofiler is a new tool for analyzing and comparing iterative optimization heuristics. It consists of two part: IOHexperimenter and IOHanalyzer.

IOHexperimenter provides easy-to-use benchmarking functionality, including:

  • A framework for straightforward benchmarking of any iterative optimization heuristic
  • Generic benchmarking procedure using suites, with two pre-installed suites: PBO for pseudo-boolean optimization and BBOB for continuous.
  • Logging methods to effortlesly store benchmarking data in a format compatible with IOHanalyzer, with future support for additional data logging options
  • (Soon to come:) A framework which significantly simplifies algorithm design

IOHanalyzer provides an intuitive tool for performance analysis, including:

  • A web-based interface (based on R) to analyze and visualize the empirical performance of IOHs
  • Interactive plotting of performance data from fixed-target and fixed-budget perspectives
  • Rigorous statistical evaluation
  • (Beta:) Automatic report generation

Source

  • Base repository : IOHprofilers GitHub Profile
  • Documentation: Arxiv Verion of “IOHprofiler: A Benchmarking and Profiling Tool for Iterative Optimization Heuristics”
  • Bug reports: IOHanalyzer or IOHexperimenter
  • Online service (IOHanalyzer): http://iohprofiler.liacs.nl
  • General Contact: iohprofiler@liacs.leidenuniv.nl
  • Mailing List: IOHprofiler mailing list

Citing

When using IOHprofiler and parts thereof, please kindly cite this work as

Carola Doerr, Hao Wang, Furong Ye, Sander van Rijn, Thomas Bäck: IOHprofiler: A Benchmarking and Profiling Tool for Iterative Optimization Heuristics, arXiv e-prints:1810.05281, 2018.

@ARTICLE{IOHprofiler,
  author = {Carola Doerr and Hao Wang and Furong Ye and Sander van Rijn and Thomas B{\"a}ck},
  title = {IOHprofiler: A Benchmarking and Profiling Tool for Iterative Optimization Heuristics},
